insert into actor_corporation(actor_name1,actor_name2,actor_id1,actor_id2,count,movies) values
( #{item.name1},#{item.name2},#{item.id1},#{item.id2},1,CONCAT('|',#{item.movies},'|') )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count=count+1, movies=CONCAT(movies,VALUES(movies),'|')
